info.name: WhatsApp Web API Wrapper
info.description: Complete API collection for WhatsApp Web automation with automatic variable management

exec: // Extract sessionId from start session response
// Extract messageId from send message response
// Extract groupId from create group response
// Extract chatId from list chats (first chat)
// Extract contactId from list contacts (first contact)
// Extract inviteCode from group invite code response

request.description: Create a new WhatsApp session. The sessionId will be automatically saved to environment.
Get QR code data as JSON. Use this to display QR code in your application.
Get QR code as PNG image. Can be displayed directly in browser or saved.
Check the current status of a session (initializing, qr, authenticated, ready, etc.)
Get detailed state information of the session
Get detailed information about the WhatsApp session
Send a text message. messageId will be automatically saved.
Send media file (image, video, document, audio). Select file in the form-data.
React to a message with emoji
Get detailed information about a message
Get all reactions for a message
Mark all messages in a chat as seen
Get all contacts. First contact ID will be auto-saved.
Get groups in common with contact
Check if a phone number exists on WhatsApp
Get all chats. First chat ID will be auto-saved.
Get detailed information about a chat
Mute a chat (unmuteDate is Unix timestamp)
Clear all messages from a chat
Get pinned messages from a chat
Get labels for a specific chat
Create a new group. groupId will be auto-saved.
Get detailed information about a group
Get group invite code. Code will be auto-saved.
Join a group using invite code
Set group info changes to admins-only
Open chat window in WhatsApp Web
Open chat window at specific message
